presentation.title: Yi aiki don hirarku na gaba na gaba!
presentation.message:
Shin …óaukar tambayoyin Ayuba ya sa ku juyayi da damuwa?
Wata∆ôila har yanzu kuna jin rashin shiri don …óaukar tambayoyin aiki?
Wannan shine cikakken app don aiwatar da kwarewar intanet a cikin tsarin hira na aiki!

presentation.title: A shirye don aikinku na gaba!
presentation.message: A hankali aiki yana amfani da karfin bayanan wucin gadi don gudanar da tattaunawar aiki na yau da kullun don taimaka muku da kyakkyawar fahimta game da tattaunawar rayuwa ta ainihi.

presentation.title: Biyan ku…ói na Premium:
presentation.message: Kar…ìi rahoto a ∆ôarshen kowace hirar kowane irin tattaunawar da ra'ayi da shawara kan yadda za a inganta damar samun hayar a cikin ayyukan hira ta ainihi.

list.title: Share tarihi?
list.message: Ka tabbata kana so ka share duk tarihin?

entry.title: Share hira?
entry.message: Shin kun tabbata kuna son share wannan tattaunawar?

validation.title: Kuskuren Tabbatarwa
validation.invalid_fields:
Sanya ingantaccen aiki mai inganci don neman sabon aikin aiki.
Na adalci
validation.unable_to_validate: Ba zai iya inganta filayen ba.

color_scheme.name: Dark Jigo
color_scheme.description:
Za…ìi tsakanin jigo da bakin ciki.
Saita ta atomatik zuwa taken na'urar ta farko ka bu…óe app.

language.name: Harshe
language.description: Za…ìi yaren da aka fi so don nunawa yayin amfani da aikace-aikacen da magana da Ai yayin tambayoyin.

cooldown.description:
Siffar da ta kyauta ta ba ku damar …óaukar hira …óaya a cikin awa …óaya.

Idan kana son cire iyakokin, cire talla, ka kar…ìi rahoton martani tare da shawara kan yadda za'a inganta bayan kowace hira, yi la'akari da yin rajista zuwa Premium.
cooldown.active:
Jira lokacin da aka kwantar da hankali kafin samar da sabon hirar.

Idan kana son cire masu cooldowns, cire talla, kuma sami rahoton martani tare da shawarwari kan kowace hirar, yi la'akari da biyan ku…ói zuwa Premium.

review.request:
Idan kuna son app …óin, don Allah a yi la'akari da barin bita don taimaka mana.

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

new_interview.title: Sabbin Tattaunawa!
new_interview.message: Kuna da sabon hirar da akwai don …óaukar aiki a hankali.

subscription.title: Ku…óin inshuwara na shekara-shekara
subscription.active: Biyan ku…ói mai aiki da aiki
subscription.thanks: Na gode da biyan ku…ói zuwa Premium! Muna muku fatan alheri da nasara akan dukkan tambayoyinku na gaba!

error.connection:
Kuskuren ha…óin.

An kasa ha…óawa zuwa kantin.
error.subscription_options:
An kasa sanya shirye-shiryen biyan ku…ói.

Don Allah, bincika ha…óin intanet …óinka, ko sake gwadawa daga baya.

error.title: Kuskure
error.unexpected: Wani abu ya faru ba daidai ba ... zaku zama ganin wannan! üò±
error.connection_fix: Duba ha…óin intanet …óinka kuma sake gwadawa daga baya.

store.short_description: Yi aiki don tattaunawar ku na gaba tare da wannan ainihin Ai Simulator
store.full_description:
Shin …óaukar tambayoyin Ayuba ya sa ku juyayi da damuwa?
Wata∆ôila har yanzu kuna jin rashin shiri don …óaukar tambayoyin aiki?
Wannan shine cikakken app don aiwatar da kwarewar intanet a cikin tsarin hira na aiki!

A hankali aiki yana amfani da ikon ilimin wucin gadi don gudanar da tambayoyin aikin tattaunawa na gaskiya don taimaka muku yin amfani da hirar na yau da kullun kuma yana sa ku shirya don saduwarku ta gaba.

An daidaita tambayoyin zuwa matsayin aikin da kuke nema, kuma za a fasalta kuma aka daidaita su da tambayoyi masu ala∆ôa da burinku don dacewa da hira ta aiki.

Masu amfani na zamani zasu kuma karbi rahoto a ∆ôarshen kowace hirar da shawara game da yadda za a inganta damar samun hayar da ke aiki a cikin ayyukan gaske.
taglines: A shirye don aikinku na gaba!
Yi aiki don hirarku na gaba na gaba!
Ace aikinku na gaba tare da AI!
Sarinku na gaba mai zuwa yana jiran ku anan!
premium_benefits: Kar…ìi rahotanni tare da amsa da shawara
Hutun Unlimited ba tare da coolowns ba
Kar…ìi rahotanni tare da amsa da shawara bayan tambayoyi

translation.title: Taimaka Fassara
translation.description: Taimakawa fassara wannan aikace-aikacen zuwa wasu yarukan.
